verses.roman:
tomā-sabāra caraṇa-dhūli karinu vandana
tāte caitanya-līlā haila ye kichu likhana

synonyms: tomā-sabāra—of all of you; caraṇa-dhūli—the dust of the feet; karinu vandana—I have prayed to; tāte—for that reason; caitanya-līlā—the pastimes of Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; haila—there was; ye—whatever; kichu—some; likhana—writing.
translation: It is because I have offered my prayers unto the lotus feet of all of you that whatever I have written about Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu has been possible.
